Name: 幻想三國誌5/Fantasia Sango 5
About the game: ● Life-and-death Brotherhood and Heart Touching Story In this chaos we live, not enough options we can take. Matters of life and death, to whom we shall protect? From those beauties or heroes, who will stay till the end? ● Intrigues and Fight to The Death for The Crown Stratagems between Zhuge and Sima, ambitiousness from the hosts, who shall last and who shall pass for this great land? ● A Feast for The Eyes with Its Delicate Designs Designed by the original team to keep its authenticity of the franchise. Delicate and stunning graphics will touch your heart! ● Real-time Battle and Operation The new real-time battle system includes 暗器,連擊, and 陣型, which brings pumped up experience on the battlefield, and also a new type of RPG battle system. ● A Successor and A Brand-new Fantasia Sango Contains main characters of this franchise, changes the Sango history through the adventure. Follow the path of those legendary heroes, and create a new one on this land! ● Magnificent and Breathtaking 3D Scenes Designed by the 3D art designers, recreated those scenes of ancient cities and tremendous battlefields, take you back to the time of the Three Kingdoms.
